desc: Two Leaves and a Bud is an independent tea company committed to offering a wide variety of organic tea, herbal tea, wellness teas and more. Our mission is to deliver the perfect cup of tea - perfect not only for how it tastes, but for its journey from garden, to cup, and back to the earth.

layout.text: Cool off with our new Matcha Lemonade–a delicious mix of matcha green tea and tangy lemonade. Dairy-free and not-too-sweet with just 5 grams of sugar per serving. It's easy to make and incredibly delicious!
